name: Train Twins - GMTK 2021
description: Made for the GMTK 2021 game jam and its theme of "Joined Together", prevent two trains from crashing while they constantly accelerate.  The track changing switch is linked to both train's set of tracks,  forcing both trains to switch tracks together. The obstacles for each train may differ though, so make sure you pick the right track that is clear for both trains!
